name: Philip H. BEHR, Petitioner v. W. Joseph IMHOFF and Bernard B. Markey, Pepper Hamilton, LLP, Respondents

parties: Philip H. BEHR, Petitioner v. W. Joseph IMHOFF and Bernard B. Markey, Pepper Hamilton, LLP, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of July, 2011, the “Application to Correct or Confirm Reference to Intermediate Court Consolidated Docket Numbers and Interested Parties to Cross[-] Petition” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Philip H. BEHR, Petitioner v. W. Joseph IMHOFF and Bernard B. Markey, Pepper Hamilton, LLP, Respondents.
No. 29 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 14, 2011.
